profile:
Serving Toronto and some of the surrounding GTA, No west end services...Like Mississauga Brampton nothing west of Bathurst and the 401.
Mega City Roofing Inc. has attained high standards for re-roofing with many years of experience. Mega City Roofing Inc. has served top-quality products and we strive to be the experts in the business. Our experienced talent and efforts are always continual in our services. We provide information on roofing products and solutions to better our customers requirements.

Mega City Roofing Inc. specializes in re-roofing residential, industrial, and commercial roofs. Even with the best quality roofing systems, your roof is only as good as the quality of the installation. Our excellent product knowledge and highest standards of workmanship assure you of a long-lasting quality roof.

All of our skilled staff is trained in roofing methods, materials, and current Occupational Health and Safety Standards, with many years of actual hands on experience and training. Our service includes inspection, consultation and recommendation of appropriate methods, materials and estimates to resolve our customers individual requirements. We have competitive prices and written guarantee's, customer friendly service and staff. We are fully insured and licensed, our employee's are covered under the WSIB to construct a safe working environment. Call us today and get your FREE estimate inspection and remember a roof is only as good as it's installation. Mega City Roofing Inc. you can trust us for all your roofing needs.

profile:
Make sure to request a FREE Estimate!

Infinity Gutter installs new seamless eavestroughs, soffits and fascia , in Toronto, the GTA and the surrounding area. We also repair existing damaged eavestroughs. As an experienced gutter and eavestrough contractor, we have the knowledge and expertise to get the job done right. We can replace your old "nail on the outside" eavestrough with a new, beautiful, one-piece seamless eavestrough which is now the industry standard.Our experience and successful track record in the installation of new eavestrough systems makes Infinity Gutter the obvious choice for seamless eavestrough replacement. 
We are fully insured. Please visit us at: http://www.infinitygutter.ca

profile:
Fortress Windows and Doors sell and install CSA Certified WindowsEnergyStar,  High Efficiency Windows
We offer our clients Quality, Integrity and Value. We believe that service after the job is completed is just as important as getting paid on the original installation.
I have had the same cell phone number since 1985 so anybody who has conducted business with us knows our number and we ALWAYS respond to our clients.
 
We run TO the problem, not away FROM the problem! (if there is one)
 
We make sure EVERY client is satisfied and that our written contract is fulfilled to the "T". We will never "upcharge" our clients and our word is our bond! (remember those days?)
When we're done your project, we want to see the smile of our clients knowing that they chose the right company to do their renovation!
34 years installing windows and doors.  Home inspector and have many real estate agents as clients who also refer business to Fortress Windows & Doors.

Our Warranty is the absolute BEST in the industry!

profile:
Bros. Roofing has provided high-quality roofing services to Great Toronto and surround area clients since 2002. Bros. Roofing is a leader in roofing systems application and client care. 

Our aim is to provide the highest levels of workmanship in our project implementation, but also to provide the best possible client experience in the industry. 

You have a lot to protect under one roof.
We are fully licensed and insured.
We offer a 15-year written guarantee on our workmanship, depending on your selection, add 30-year to lifetime product guarantee.

Balancing those two aspects of our work, while maintaining value pricing, is what sets Bros. Roofing contractors apart.

That is why we offer dependable roofing services and products your family can trust.

If your roof needs repair or replacement, due to age or extreme weather, our experienced team will accurately evaluate its condition, make suitable product suggestions, and provide the skilled craftsmanship needed to ensure a quality job. 
Surprising to many, our high-quality job does not come with a high price tag!
All our services are competitively priced and we provide educational information as well. 

You can count on us:
Most Affordable and Excellenct Roofing Service For You~~

profile:
Siding and Eavestrough Contractor, servicing Toronto and the GTA. Home Doctor supplies and installs vinyl and aluminum siding, vinyl shakes, siding insulation, 5" & 6" seamless aluminum and copper eavestroughs & downpipes, aluminum and copper fascia, aluminum and copper soffits, custom aluminum and copper capping, flashing and trim work. Our skilled crews are equipped to install both 5" & 6" seamless aluminum and copper eavestroughs, all with mitred corners. Check out our website to see the vast colour and style options that we have available in vinyl & aluminum siding and shakes.

****

Call us to book a FREE, no obligation house call and estimate.

****

Why choose Home Doctor?

- Servicing Toronto & the GTA
- Customer service is our #1 priority
- Homes of any age, size or configuration
- Highly skilled installation crews 
- Residential & commercial projects
- Competitive pricing
- Extensive colour & style options
- Premium Canadian made materials
- Prompt, efficient & clean service
- Quality workmanship
- Satisfaction guaranteed
- All crews have WSIB clearance
- Working at heights certified
- Fully insured

Ask us about our BUNDLE DISCOUNTS. Save up to 25% when you replace your eavestroughs, fascia & soffits together.

All materials installed by Home Doctor are covered by a manufacturer's lifetime warranty.

profile:
After being in the industry for several years we’ve learned customer satisfaction and quality workmanship are the cornerstones of business in the construction industry and we at Oak Hills Roofing take pride in our work.  From the initial telephone conversation to the completed project, we’re here for you!
  
At Oak Hills Roofing not only do we specialize in roofing services to both residential and commercial customers but we also do eavestroughs, facia, soffits, siding, decks, fences and much more. In Ontario, we proudly serve Northumberland County, Durham Region, Peterborough, the Kawartha’s and the GTA.  We are professional, experienced, dependable and hard-working. Call or email anytime and request a free estimate. We are confident that we can provide you with a reasonable quote for quality workmanship!
 
Phone: 905-269-8839
Email contact for quotes: jay@oakhillsroofing.ca
https://www.facebook.com/oakhillsroofing/

profile:
Mint Roofing Ltd. is a professional roofing contractor that serves residential and commercial property owners in Durham and York Regions.
Our firm is fully licensed, certified and insured. We carry over $ 5 million of liability coverage which provides our clients and contractors peace of mind and protection.

Our team of trained consultants have over 30 years of industry experience and have proudly served thousands of clients across the GTA including home owners, business owners, engineer firms, restoration and insurance companies.

Our business model is a simple one however we mean every word

-  Provide honest advice and exceptional service
-  Keep our promises EVERY time
-  Only install high quality products that provide our clients warranty coverage and protection
- Treat our clients and their homes with unparalleled respect
  
  Do all of these things for an affordable and fair price 
 
Mint Roofing Ltd. have the knowledge, experience and capacity to tackle any roofing, siding, eavestrough or insulation project. 
The team members are easy to work with and respect our clients busy schedules, we will make every effort to meet you at a time that is convenient for you.
We welcome the opportunity to meet with you to review your project, answer any questions or concerns that you have, and ensure that you are educated and comfortable with the products, offerings and options that we recommend for your home or business.

We hope to serve you soon, for more information please visit our website or contact us by phone today

profile:
Leafguard is available in Canada

Trades by Jack is proud to offer this fantastic product to help you. Avoid the messy work involved in dealing with your gutters and eavestroughs.

Say goodbye to the dangerous and unpleasant job of climbing up to your roof to clean out your gutters once and for all, without the expense of paying someone else to do it.

Gutters capture the rainwater from your roof and carry it safely to the ground, away from your foundation, where it can cause serious damage. Ordinary gutters capture leaves, twigs and other organic debris that causes them to clog and overflow during rainstorms.

 •LeafGuard’s patented design causes rainwater to flow around its curved hood and into the gutter, keeping leaves and debris out.
 •LeafGuard Brand Gutters are guaranteed not to clog for as long as you own your home, or Gutter Depot will clean your gutters for free.
 •LeafGuard Gutters are made to fit any home in a variety of colours. Best of all they are made out durable materials, designed to last as long as you have a roof.
 
 Call Us for Free Estimate!


Service Areas: Ajax, Aurora, Bolton, Brampton, Burlington, Etobicoke, Markham, Mississauga, Newmarket, North York, Maple, Oakville, Oshawa, Pickering, Scarborough, Thornhill, Richmond Hill, Toronto, Vaughan, Whitby, Woodbridge & Beyond!


Contact Details

Address: 5132 Timberlea Blvd.
Mississauga, Ontario, L4W 2S5
Phone: (289) 271-0636
Email: info@tradesbyjack.ca


Why Trades by Jack?

Trades by Jack can help you say goodbye, permanently, to the dangerous and distressing job of clearing out your rain gutters –without having to pay someone else to do it.

profile:
Reayou Roofing is a team of specialist Torontonian roofers who understand the city’s weather and atmosphere. Their output is built to last harsh winters, as a result.

They’re also certified and insured. That matters because unlike plumbing, roofing is an unregulated industry.

Therefore, it’s vital to hire a team that is certified and insured. You wouldn’t want to end up paying more in repairs for a weak roof later!

Another positive point about them when it comes to cost-efficiency is that Reayou l doesn’t have unreasonable charges even for custom roofing. This is based on what we’ve seen of past project quotes.

And whether you need a new roof or your current one needs an upgrade, Reayou doesn’t shy away from any project, however complex. Their estimates are given free and upfront, so you’re not up all night worrying about how much this new roof is going to cost you.

There might be a chance that you don’t even need to get your roof replaced entirely, actually. Reayou doesn’t always push clients to spend on new roofing, especially if you’re a homeowner on a tight budget.

Pros

Affordable
Extensive services
Free quotes upfront
Works fast
